class.name: GodotSharp
class.brief_description: Bridge between Godot and the Mono runtime (Mono-enabled builds only).
class.description: This class is a bridge between Godot and the Mono runtime. It exposes several low-level operations and is only available in Mono-enabled Godot builds. See also [CSharpScript].

method.name: attach_thread
method.description: Attaches the current thread to the Mono runtime.

method.name: detach_thread
method.description: Detaches the current thread from the Mono runtime.

method.name: get_domain_id
method.description: Returns the current MonoDomain ID. [b]Note:[/b] The Mono runtime must be initialized for this method to work (use [method is_runtime_initialized] to check). If the Mono runtime isn't initialized at the time this method is called, the engine will crash.

method.name: get_scripts_domain_id
method.description: Returns the scripts MonoDomain's ID. This will be the same MonoDomain ID as [method get_domain_id], unless the scripts domain isn't loaded. [b]Note:[/b] The Mono runtime must be initialized for this method to work (use [method is_runtime_initialized] to check). If the Mono runtime isn't initialized at the time this method is called, the engine will crash.

method.name: is_domain_finalizing_for_unload
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the domain is being finalized, [code]false[/code] otherwise.

method.name: is_runtime_initialized
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the Mono runtime is initialized, [code]false[/code] otherwise.

method.name: is_runtime_shutting_down
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the Mono runtime is shutting down, [code]false[/code] otherwise.

method.name: is_scripts_domain_loaded
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the scripts domain is loaded, [code]false[/code] otherwise.
